official-title.#text:
To amend title 38, United States Code, to direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide
			 hospital care and medical services in non-Department facilities for
			 veterans waiting longer than 14 days for an appointment in a Department
			 facility, and for other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Access to Veteran-Centered Community Care Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Access to Veteran-Centered Community Care Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, is amended by adding at the end the following new
			 subsection:

header.#text:
Department of Veterans Affairs provision of hospital care and medical services in non-Department
			 facilities for veterans waiting 14 days or longer for an appointment

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall determine that if any veteran
			 has been waiting for 14 days or longer for an appointment to receive
			 hospital care or medical services, including primary care, in a

facility is not capable of furnishing the
			 care or services required. The

shall ensure that such care or
			 services are provided to such a veteran at a non-Department facility under
			 a contract under this section.

text.#text: In carrying out this section, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
who may reject such
			 referral during the 72-hour period following such submittal. If the
does not reject the referral during such period, the

shall ensure that such specialty care is provided to the veteran at a
			 non-Department facility under a contract under this section.

text.#text:
If, in the course of receiving hospital care or medical services in a non-Department facility, a
			 veteran is referred to another non-Department facility for specialty care,
			 such referral shall be submitted to the

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 4898 IH: Access to Veteran-Centered Community Care Act
